BasicDetails.Title: 1 Bed on Comm Ave Mall
BasicDetails.Description:
This beautiful 1 bedroom apartment is located on the garden level of a gorgeous brownstone located in Back Bay. The building is situated on Commonwealth Avenue, overlooking the Commonwealth Avenue Mall. The exterior of the building has been maintained exhibiting neoclassical architectural detail.
Sophisticated elegance is the hallmark of Back Bay and this home lives up to the standard. The open floor plan and ample windows create an elegant, spacious atmosphere. The gleaming hardwood floors, update appliances and crown molding provide the sophistication.
Do not let this opportunity to live in Boston's more desired neighborhood pass you by. Call for a showing today.

RichDetails.AdditionalFeatures: Cable Ready,Fantastic Location,Granite Countertops,Hardwood Floors,High-Speed Internet,Modern Kitchen,Near Public Transportation

BasicDetails.Description:
Call today about this beautiful Brookline apartment. Plenty of space, natural light, and a charm all its own greet you every time you come home to this 1-bedroom apartment. Neighborhood amenities include dining, shopping, access to public transit, and more! You will love calling 30 Gardner Rd. home. Elevator
Known for the multitude of shops and restaurants, Washington Square has a vibrant and charming atmosphere. The streets are clean and beautifully landscaped. Washington Square really comes alive, as the neighborhood is filled with people dining at the various restaurants or simply enjoying an evening stroll.
Walk to shops and restaurants, services such as dry cleaners, shoe repair, multiple hair and nail salons, and many more!
Washington Square has a restaurant to satisfy any craving, including Thai, Chinese, Italian, Japanese, and American Grill. Small cafes and bakeries line the streets, allowing you to grab a coffee to-go or stay and enjoy a relaxing lunch.
The neighborhood has a large supermarket as well as a nearby Whole-Foods market.

RichDetails.AdditionalFeatures: Elevator,Public Transportation

BasicDetails.Title: Brand New Brookline Luxury! Laundry in unit! Call for a tour...
BasicDetails.Description:
Residences at 455 Harvard Feature the Following In-Unit Amenities:
FINISHED CLOSETS
ENERGY EFFICIENT WINDOWS
INDIVIDUAL HEATING & COOLING
USB PORTS
SPACIOUS BATHROOMS
SOUNDPROOF INSULATION
PRIVATE OUTDOOR AREAS
IN-UNIT LAUNDRY
HARDWOOD FLOORS
CAESARSTONE COUNTERTOPS
GARAGE PARKING
BREAKFAST BAR
HIGH CEILINGS
VIRTUAL INTERCOM
Newest luxury building in Brookline located in the heart of Coolidge Corner. High-end living matched with a highly desirable location. 455 Harvard features oversized layouts, a fitness center, modern security and package systems, recycling and refuse chutes, and more. This one plus den is absolutely stunning. Unit features include laundry, brand new everything, closets with shelving systems, and ease of access from the building elevator. Luxury finishes include Caeserstone countertops with breakfast bar waterfall, all stainless appliances, floating vanities, and soaking depth tubs. Come see the beautiful architecture and attention to detail that was put into this amazing luxury building.
455 Harvard Features The Following Amenities:
VIRTUAL INTERCOM
PRIVATE OUTDOOR AREAS
VALET LAUNDRY
LOBBY LOUNGE WITH WI-FI
PROFESSIONALLY MANAGED
ELEVATOR
GARAGE PARKING
FITNESS ROOM
PET FRIENDLY
BIKE STORAGE
PACKAGE CONCIERGE
